weekly_top_story.headline: Medicare Unveils Successor to ACO REACH
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS is replacing the ACO REACH value-based care pilot with ACO LEAD, addressing key provider concerns and potentially reshaping Medicare payment models for better sustainability.

stories.headline: FDA approves drug to improve functional capacity and symptoms in adults with rare inherited heart condition
stories.summary: The FDA approved a new drug on December 23 that enhances functional capacity and reduces symptoms for adults with a rare inherited heart condition, offering a novel treatment option for underserved patients.
